name: Gumroad Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Gumroad Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Gumroad events via webhooks

resource.name: resource
resource.description: The resource is gonna fire the event
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 作用: The resource is gonna fire the event | (必填项)
available_options: Cancellation (值: cancellation) - When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of cancellations of the user's subscribers
Dispute (值: dispute) - When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of the disputes raised against user's sales
Dispute Won (值: dispute_won) - When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of the sale disputes won
Refund (值: refund) - When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of refunds to the user's sales
Sale (值: sale) - When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of the user's sales
